entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
